title: Confessions of a Prodigal Daughter
description: Growing up Jewish in a conservative Catholic town, Sarahbeth Caplin fought to create a genuine Jewish identity. But as she tried to observe Jewish rituals, and even considered a call to become a Rabbi, she felt increasingly drawn to Jesus. Confessions of a Prodigal Daughter is a story about the struggle to reconcile two seemingly contradictory sides of yourself. It's a story about leaving what is comfortable and familiar, sacrificing some relationships in the process, in order to find one's true purpose.
author: Sarahbeth Caplin
